welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ermita, Philippines! Known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning landmarks, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device, with option to extend for a fee.
